architect_notes: Based on the Christopher Cole 'Dragon Portfolio' framework. Designed for Stagflation resilience.

secular_equities.rationale: Captures human productivity and growth. Essential for 'Boom' cycles.

fixed_income.rationale: Hedge against Deflationary Bust. Flight-to-safety asset.

gold.rationale: Hedge against Fiat Devaluation and negative real rates.

commodity_trend.rationale: Hedge against Inflation/Supply Shocks. Captures sustained moves.

long_volatility.rationale: 'Crisis Alpha' - Profits from systemic instability and crashes.

rebalancing_rules.logic: Rebalance when asset weight drifts > 5% or volatility spikes (Shannon's Demon effect).
